text:
```json
{
  "explanation": "The description 'Used in order to detect spam and improve the website's security. Does not store visitor specific data' aligns with activities aimed at preventing misuse or abuse of services and ensuring security. Therefore, 'Misuse, Prevention and Detection' (line 7) and 'Enforce Security' (line 20) are the most relevant purposes. 'Enforce Access Control' (line 64) is also applicable as part of security measures. Concepts such as personalised recommendations, communication management, and commercial purposes do not match the described activities in the prompt and therefore are not included.",

    7,

    64
  ],
  "unmatchedConcepts": [
    "personalised recommendations",
    "communication management",
    "commercial purposes"
  ]
}
```
